thread.title: Pilots' union may call for walkouts at Lufthansa
thread.title_full: Pilots' union may call for walkouts at Lufthansa | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Pilots' union may call for walkouts at Lufthansa
text:
FRANKFURT German pilots union Vereinigung Cockpit (VC) said Lufthansa had rejected its offer of concessions and said it could call for strikes at any time.
"Lufthansa, Lufthansa Cargo and Germanwings can expect industrial action at any time," VC said in a statement on Wednesday.
VC had offered concessions last month in a bid to end a long-running pay dispute at Lufthansa, including agreeing to an increase in the average retirement age and lowering costs.
(Reporting by Maria Sheahan ; Editing by Georgina Prodhan )
